QList.name: q1
QList.question: Is there a documented data governance framework in place?

QList.name: q2
QList.question: Are data governance roles and responsibilities clearly defined and communicated?

QList.name: q3
QList.question: Is there a data governance steering committee or governing body established?

QList.name: q4
QList.question: Are data governance policies and procedures documented and enforced?

QList.name: q5
QList.question: Is there a defined data strategy aligned with business objectives?

QList.name: q6
QList.question: Has a data governance roadmap or plan been developed?

QList.name: q7
QList.question: Is there a process for identifying critical data elements and defining data quality requirements?

QList.name: q8
QList.question: Are data classification and data lifecycle management practices in place?

QList.name: q9
QList.question: Is there a dedicated data governance team or responsible individuals?

QList.name: q10
QList.question: Do data governance roles exist at different organizational levels?

QList.name: q11
QList.question: Are there sufficient resources and skills to support data governance initiatives?

QList.name: q12
QList.question: Is there a mechanism for collaboration and communication among data governance stakeholders?

QList.name: q13
QList.question: Are data quality standards defined and monitored?

QList.name: q14
QList.question: Is there a data quality issue identification and resolution process?

QList.name: q15
QList.question: Are data quality metrics tracked and reported regularly?

QList.name: q16
QList.question: Is there a feedback loop for data consumers to report data quality issues?

QList.name: q17
QList.question: Is there a privacy and security policy framework in place?

QList.name: q18
QList.question: Are data privacy regulations (e.g., GDPR, CCPA) considered and addressed?

QList.name: q19
QList.question: Is there a data classification framework that includes privacy sensitivity?

QList.name: q20
QList.question: Are appropriate access controls and data protection measures implemented?

QList.name: q21
QList.question: Are data stewards assigned to manage data assets?

QList.name: q22
QList.question: Is there a clear understanding of data ownership and accountability?

QList.name: q23
QList.question: Are data governance practices integrated into data stewardship responsibilities?

QList.name: q24
QList.question: Is there a process for resolving data-related conflicts or issues?

QList.name: q25
QList.question: Is there an enterprise-wide data integration strategy?

QList.name: q26
QList.question: Are data integration standards and best practices defined?

QList.name: q27
QList.question: Is there a data catalog or metadata management system in place?

QList.name: q28
QList.question: Is there a data architecture that supports data governance requirements?

QList.name: q29
QList.question: Is there a documented process for data acquisition, creation, and validation?

QList.name: q30
QList.question: Are data retention and archiving policies established and enforced?

QList.name: q31
QList.question: Is there a mechanism for data obsolescence and disposal?

QList.name: q32
QList.question: Are data backup and recovery strategies in place?
Are key performance indicators (KPIs) defined to measure data governance effectiveness?
Is there a process for monitoring and reporting data governance metrics?
Are there periodic assessments or audits conducted to evaluate data governance maturity?
Are data governance improvement initiatives identified and tracked?
